effect.sword_shield: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.legends_arceus: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.sword_shield: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
